net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_deathSaves
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Death Save dialog. Needs the following properties passed: { "id": Make the death saves for this token, "current": The token's current hit points. "dsPass": The token's DSPass property value, "dsFail", The token's DSFail property value, "stable", Is the token Stable?, "dead", Is the token Dead? } Requires that the MaxHP and TempHP properties are set Requires that the Exhaustion 6 state is set. When finished call dnd5e_applyHealth macro to update properties and states Roll submit button makes a death save and then update DSPass or DSFail properties Set submit button sets DSPass and DSFail values to match the check boxes on the dialog
